storeContent.description: Store text or JSON content at session or agent scope

parameters.content: Text or JSON content to store
parameters.agentId: Agent ID (required when scope is agent)

retrieveContent.description: Retrieve text or JSON content from session or agent scope

parameters.agentId: Agent ID (required when scope is agent)

listContent.description: List all stored paths at session or agent scope

parameters.prefix: Optional prefix to filter paths (e.g., settings/)
parameters.agentId: Agent ID (required when scope is agent)

deleteContent.description: Delete content at a specific path from session or agent scope

parameters.agentId: Agent ID, name, or URL (required when scope is agent)
